verbose_text: In spite of several toxin mediated cytotoxic properties, only alpha-toxin (alpha-hemolysin) and Panton-Valentine leukocidin (PVL) have been reported to promote exhibit pro-apoptosis-like death in host cells.
evidence: alpha-hemolysin) and Panton-Valentine leukocidin (PVL) have been reported to promote exhibit pro-apoptosis-like death
